Sidebar st.sidebar.header('ğŸ“‹ Parametreler') sample_size = st.sidebar.slider('Ã–rnek boyutu', 10, 1000, 100) chart_type = st.sidebar.selectbox('Grafik tÃ¼rÃ¼', ['Scatter', 'Line', 'Bar']) # Ana iÃ§erik col1, col2 = st.columns(2) with col1: st.header('ğŸ“ˆ Veri Ãœretimi') # Ã–rnek veri oluÅŸtur data = pd.DataFrame({ 'x': np.random.randn(sample_size), 'y': np.random.randn(sample_size), 'kategori': np.random.choice(['A', 'B', 'C'], sample_size) }) st.dataframe(data.head(10), use_container_width=True) # Ä°statistikler st.subheader('ğŸ“Š Temel Ä°statistikler') stats = { 'Ortalama X': data['x'].mean(), 'Ortalama Y': data['y'].mean(), 'Standart Sapma X': data['x'].std(), 'Standart Sapma Y': data['y'].std() } for key, value in stats.items(): st.metric(key, f"{value:.2f}") with col2: st.header('ğŸ“Š GÃ¶rselleÅŸtirme') if chart_type == 'Scatter': fig = px.scatter(data, x='x', y='y', color='kategori', title='Scatter Plot') elif chart_type == 'Line': fig = px.line(data.sort_values('x'), x='x', y='y', title='Line Plot') else: fig = px.bar(data.groupby('kategori').size().reset_index(name='count'), x='kategori', y='count', title='Bar Chart') st.plotly_chart(fig, use_container_width=True) # Veri indirme st.header('ğŸ’¾ Veri Ä°ndirme') if st.button('CSV olarak indir'): csv = data.to_csv(index=False) st.download_button( label="ğŸ“ CSV dosyasÄ±nÄ± indir", data=csv, file_name='veri_analizi.csv', mime='text/csv' ) st.success('âœ… Veri baÅŸarÄ±yla oluÅŸturuldu!')''', 'utils.py': '''import pandas as pd import numpy as np from datetime import datetime, timedelta def generate_sample_data(size=100, start_date='2024-01-01'): """ Ã–rnek zaman serisi verisi Ã¼retir """ start = pd.to_datetime(start_date) dates = [start + timedelta(days=i) for i in range(size)] return pd.DataFrame({ 'tarih': dates, 'deger': np.random.randn(size).cumsum() + 100, 'kategori': np.random.choice(['A', 'B', 'C'], size), 'hacim': np.random.randint(1000, 10000, size) }) def calculate_statistics(df, column='deger'): """ Temel istatistikleri hesaplar """ return { 'ortalama': df[column].mean(), 'medyan': df[column].median(), 'standart_sapma': df[column].std(), 'minimum': df[column].min(), 'maksimum': df[column].max(), 'q25': df[column].quantile(0.25), 'q75': df[column].quantile(0.75) } def create_summary_table(df): """ Ã–zet tablo oluÅŸturur """ summary = df.describe() return summary ''' } }, 'dashboard': { 'name': 'ğŸ¯ Dashboard Projesi', 'files': { 'app.py': '''import streamlit as st import plotly.express as px import plotly.graph_objects as go import pandas as pd import numpy as np st.set_page_config(page_title="Dashboard", layout="wide") st.title('ğŸ¯ Ä°ÅŸ Dashboard\'u') # Ã–rnek veri np.random.seed(42) data = pd.DataFrame({ 'Kategori': ['SatÄ±ÅŸ', 'Pazarlama', 'Operasyon', 'Ä°K', 'Finans'], 'Bu_Ay': [250000, 180000, 320000, 150000, 200000], 'Gecen_Ay': [230000, 190000, 300000, 140000, 180000], 'Hedef': [280000, 200000, 350000, 160000, 220000] }) # Ãœst metrikler col1, col2, col3, col4 = st.columns(4) with col1: total_current = data['Bu_Ay'].sum() total_previous = data['Gecen_Ay'].sum() delta = total_current - total_previous st.metric("ğŸ’° Toplam Gelir", f"â‚º{total_current:,}", f"{delta:+,}") with col2: avg_performance = (data['Bu_Ay'] / data['Hedef']).mean() * 100 st.metric("ğŸ“Š Ortalama Performans", f"{avg_performance:.1f}%") with col3: best_dept = data.loc[data['Bu_Ay'].idxmax(), 'Kategori'] st.metric("ğŸ† En Ä°yi Departman", best_dept) with col4: growth_rate = ((total_current - total_previous) / total_previous) * 100 st.metric("ğŸ“ˆ BÃ¼yÃ¼me OranÄ±", f"{growth_rate:.1f}%") st.divider() # Tab'lar tab1, tab2, tab3, tab4 = st.tabs(['ğŸ“Š Departman Analizi', 'ğŸ“ˆ Trend Analizi', 'ğŸ¯ Hedef KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma', 'ğŸ“‹ Detay Tablo']) with tab1: col1, col2 = st.columns(2) with col1: fig_bar = px.bar(data, x='Kategori', y='Bu_Ay', title='Departman BazÄ±nda Bu Ay PerformansÄ±', color='Bu_Ay', color_continuous_scale='viridis') st.plotly_chart(fig_bar, use_container_width=True) with col2: fig_pie = px.pie(data, values='Bu_Ay', names='Kategori', title='Departman BazÄ±nda DaÄŸÄ±lÄ±m') st.plotly_chart(fig_pie, use_container_width=True) with tab2: # Trend verisi oluÅŸtur months = ['Ocak', 'Åubat', 'Mart', 'Nisan', 'MayÄ±s', 'Haziran'] trend_data = pd.DataFrame({ 'Ay': months, 'Toplam': [800000, 850000, 920000, 880000, 950000, total_current] }) fig_line = px.line(trend_data, x='Ay', y='Toplam', title='6 AylÄ±k Gelir Trendi', markers=True) fig_line.update_traces(line_color='#667eea', line_width=3) st.plotly_chart(fig_line, use_container_width=True) with tab3: # Hedef karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rmasÄ± data_melted = pd.melt(data, id_vars=['Kategori'], value_vars=['Bu_Ay', 'Hedef'], var_name='Tip', value_name='DeÄŸer') fig_grouped = px.bar(data_melted, x='Kategori', y='DeÄŸer', color='Tip', barmode='group', title='GerÃ§ekleÅŸen vs Hedef KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rmasÄ±') st.plotly_chart(fig_grouped, use_container_width=True) # Hedef baÅŸarÄ± oranlarÄ± data['BaÅŸarÄ±_OranÄ±'] = (data['Bu_Ay'] / data['Hedef'] * 100).round(1) for _, row in data.iterrows(): color = "ğŸŸ¢" if row['BaÅŸarÄ±_OranÄ±'] >= 100 else "ğŸŸ¡" if row['BaÅŸarÄ±_OranÄ±'] >= 90 else "ğŸ”´" st.write(f"{color} **{row['Kategori']}**: %{row['BaÅŸarÄ±_OranÄ±']} ({row['Bu_Ay']:,} / {row['Hedef']:,})") with tab4: st.subheader('ğŸ“‹ Detay Veri Tablosu') # Hesaplanan sÃ¼tunlar ekle display_data = data.copy() display_data['DeÄŸiÅŸim'] = display_data['Bu_Ay'] - display_data['Gecen_Ay'] display_data['DeÄŸiÅŸim_YÃ¼zde'] = ((display_data['Bu_Ay'] - display_data['Gecen_Ay']) / display_data['Gecen_Ay'] * 100).round(2) display_data['Hedef_Kalan'] = display_data['Hedef'] - display_data['Bu_Ay'] st.dataframe(display_data, use_container_width=True) # Excel indirme def convert_df_to_excel(df): output = io.BytesIO() with pd.ExcelWriter(output, engine='openpyxl') as writer: df.to_excel(writer, sheet_name='Dashboard_Data', index=False) return output.getvalue() excel_data = convert_df_to_excel(display_data) st.download_button( label="ğŸ“ Excel olarak indir", data=excel_data, file_name='dashboard_data.xlsx', mime='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' ) # Footer st.divider() st.markdown("**ğŸ“Š Dashboard Ã–zeti:** TÃ¼m departmanlar genel olarak hedeflerine yakÄ±n performans gÃ¶steriyor.")''' } } } if 'active_project' not in st.session_state: st.session_state.active_project = 'veri_analizi' if 'active_file' not in st.session_state: st.session_state.active_file = 'main.py' # Sidebar - Proje YÃ¶neticisi with st.sidebar: st.header("ğŸ“ Proje YÃ¶neticisi") # Proje seÃ§imi project_names = {k: v['name'] for k, v in st.session_state.projects.items()} selected_project = st.selectbox( "Aktif Proje", options=list(project_names.keys()), format_func=lambda x: project_names[x], index=list(project_names.keys()).index(st.session_state.active_project) ) if selected_project != st.session_state.active_project: st.session_state.active_project = selected_project st.session_state.active_file = list(st.session_state.projects[selected_project]['files'].keys())[0] st.rerun() # Buraya kodunuzu yazÄ±n st.success("Proje hazÄ±r!")''' } } st.session_state.active_project = project_key st.session_state.active_file = 'main.py' st.success(f"âœ… {new_project_name} projesi oluÅŸturuldu!") st.rerun() st.divider() # Dosya yÃ¶neticisi st.subheader("ğŸ“„ Dosyalar") current_project = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] # Dosya seÃ§imi selected_file = st.selectbox( "Aktif Dosya", options=list(current_project['files'].keys()), index=list(current_project['files'].keys()).index(st.session_state.active_file) ) if selected_file != st.session_state.active_file: st.session_state.active_file = selected_file st.rerun() # Yeni dosya ekleme new_file_name = st.text_input("Yeni dosya adÄ± (Ã¶rn: utils.py)") if st.button("Dosya Ekle") and new_file_name: if not new_file_name.endswith('.py'): new_file_name += '.py' st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][new_file_name] = f'''# {new_file_name} # Yeni dosya iÃ§eriÄŸi buraya yazÄ±lacak ''' st.session_state.active_file = new_file_name st.success(f"âœ… {new_file_name} dosyasÄ± eklendi!") st.rerun() st.divider() # Proje iÅŸlemleri st.subheader("ğŸ”§ Proje Ä°ÅŸlemleri") # Proje export if st.button("ğŸ“¦ Projeyi Export Et"): project_data = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] json_data = json.dumps(project_data, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) st.download_button( label="ğŸ’¾ JSON olarak indir", data=json_data, file_name=f"{st.session_state.active_project}.json", mime="application/json" ) # Ana iÃ§erik alanÄ± current_project = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] current_file_content = current_project['files'][st.session_state.active_file] # Proje bilgileri col1, col2, col3 = st.columns([2, 1, 1]) with col1: st.markdown(f"### ğŸ“ {current_project['name']}") with col2: st.markdown(f"**ğŸ“„ Dosya:** `{st.session_state.active_file}`") with col3: if st.button("ğŸ”„ SayfayÄ± Yenile"): st.rerun() # Tab'lar tab1, tab2, tab3 = st.tabs(["âœï¸ Kod EditÃ¶rÃ¼", "ğŸ‘ï¸ Ã–nizleme", "ğŸ“Š Analiz"]) with tab1: st.subheader(f"ğŸ“ {st.session_state.active_file} - Kod EditÃ¶rÃ¼") # Kod editÃ¶rÃ¼ edited_code = st.text_area( "Kod", value=current_file_content, height=500, help="Python kodunuzu buraya yazÄ±n", label_visibility="collapsed" ) # Kod gÃ¼ncelleme if edited_code != current_file_content: if st.button("ğŸ’¾ DeÄŸiÅŸiklikleri Kaydet"): st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][st.session_state.active_file] = edited_code st.success("âœ… Kod baÅŸarÄ±yla kaydedildi!") st.rerun() # Kod kopyalama st.code(current_file_content, language='python') col1, col2 = st.columns(2) with col1: if st.button("ğŸ“‹ Kodu Kopyala"): st.code(current_file_content, language='python') st.info("ğŸ’¡ YukarÄ±daki kod bloÄŸundan kopyalayabilirsiniz") with col2: # Dosya indirme st.download_button( label="ğŸ“ DosyayÄ± Ä°ndir", data=current_file_content, file_name=st.session_state.active_file, mime="text/plain" ) with tab2: st.subheader("ğŸ‘ï¸ Kod Ã–nizlemesi") st.markdown("""

  2. Yeni bir .py dosyasÄ± oluÅŸturup yapÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±n

""", unsafe_allow_html=True) # Kod syntax highlighting st.code(current_file_content, language='python') with tab3: st.subheader("ğŸ“Š Kod Analizi") # Kod istatistikleri lines = current_file_content.split('\n') col1, col2, col3, col4 = st.columns(4) with col1: st.metric("ğŸ“ Toplam SatÄ±r", len(lines)) with col2: non_empty_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip()]) st.metric("ğŸ“ Kod SatÄ±rlarÄ±", non_empty_lines) with col3: comment_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip().startswith('#')]) st.metric("ğŸ’¬ Yorum SatÄ±rlarÄ±", comment_lines) with col4: import_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip().startswith(('import ', 'from '))]) st.metric("ğŸ“¦ Import SatÄ±rlarÄ±", import_lines) # Import analizi imports = [line.strip() for line in lines if line.strip().startswith(('import ', 'from '))] if imports: st.subheader("ğŸ“¦ KullanÄ±lan KÃ¼tÃ¼phaneler") for imp in imports: st.code(imp, language='python') # Footer st.divider() st.markdown("""

ğŸš€ Streamlit Kodlama ArayÃ¼zÃ¼ | Tab geÃ§iÅŸli proje yÃ¶netimi

ğŸ’¡ Projelerinizi organize edin, kodlayÄ±n ve test edin!

""", unsafe_allow_html=True)

Yeni proje ekleme st.subheader("â• Yeni Proje") new_project_name = st.text_input("Proje adÄ±") if st.button("Proje OluÅŸtur") and new_project_name: project_key = new_project_name.lower().replace(' ', '_') st.session_state.projects[project_key] = { 'name': new_project_name, 'files': { 'main.py': f'''import streamlit as st st.title('{new_project_name}') st.write("ğŸš€ Yeni proje baÅŸlatÄ±ldÄ±!") # Buraya kodunuzu yazÄ±n st.success("Proje hazÄ±r!")''' } } st.session_state.active_project = project_key st.session_state.active_file = 'main.py' st.success(f"âœ… {new_project_name} projesi oluÅŸturuldu!") st.rerun() st.divider() # Dosya yÃ¶neticisi st.subheader("ğŸ“„ Dosyalar") current_project = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] # Dosya seÃ§imi selected_file = st.selectbox( "Aktif Dosya", options=list(current_project['files'].keys()), index=list(current_project['files'].keys()).index(st.session_state.active_file) ) if selected_file != st.session_state.active_file: st.session_state.active_file = selected_file st.rerun() # Yeni dosya ekleme new_file_name = st.text_input("Yeni dosya adÄ± (Ã¶rn: utils.py)") if st.button("Dosya Ekle") and new_file_name: if not new_file_name.endswith('.py'): new_file_name += '.py' st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][new_file_name] = f'''# {new_file_name} # Yeni dosya iÃ§eriÄŸi buraya yazÄ±lacak ''' st.session_state.active_file = new_file_name st.success(f"âœ… {new_file_name} dosyasÄ± eklendi!") st.rerun() st.divider() # Proje iÅŸlemleri st.subheader("ğŸ”§ Proje Ä°ÅŸlemleri") # Proje export if st.button("ğŸ“¦ Projeyi Export Et"): project_data = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] json_data = json.dumps(project_data, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) st.download_button( label="ğŸ’¾ JSON olarak indir", data=json_data, file_name=f"{st.session_state.active_project}.json", mime="application/json" ) st.divider() # Proje import st.subheader("ğŸ“¥ Proje Ä°mport") # JSON dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kleme uploaded_json = st.file_uploader( "JSON proje dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kle", type=['json'], help="Daha Ã¶nce export ettiÄŸiniz proje dosyasÄ±nÄ± yÃ¼kleyin" ) if uploaded_json is not None: try: # JSON dosyasÄ±nÄ± oku json_data = json.loads(uploaded_json.read().decode('utf-8')) # Proje adÄ±nÄ± al import_project_name = st.text_input( "Ä°mport edilecek proje adÄ±", value=uploaded_json.name.replace('.json', '') ) if st.button("ğŸ“¥ JSON Projesini Ä°mport Et") and import_project_name: project_key = import_project_name.lower().replace(' ', '_').replace('-', '_') # Proje var mÄ± kontrol et if project_key in st.session_state.projects: st.warning("âš ï¸ Bu isimde bir proje zaten var!") else: # Projeyi ekle st.session_state.projects[project_key] = { 'name': import_project_name, 'files': json_data.get('files', {}) } st.session_state.active_project = project_key st.session_state.active_file = list(json_data.get('files', {}).keys())[0] st.success(f"âœ… {import_project_name} projesi baÅŸarÄ±yla import edildi!") st.rerun() except Exception as e: st.error(f"âŒ JSON dosyasÄ± okuma hatasÄ±: {str(e)}") # Python dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kleme st.subheader("ğŸ“„ Python DosyasÄ± YÃ¼kle") uploaded_py = st.file_uploader( "Python dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kle", type=['py'], help="Mevcut projeye Python dosyasÄ± ekleyin" ) if uploaded_py is not None: try: # Python dosyasÄ±nÄ± oku file_content = uploaded_py.read().decode('utf-8') file_name = uploaded_py.name if st.button(f"ğŸ“¥ {file_name} dosyasÄ±nÄ± ekle"): # Dosya var mÄ± kontrol et if file_name in st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files']: if st.checkbox(f"âš ï¸ {file_name} zaten var. Ãœzerine yaz?"): st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][file_name] = file_content st.session_state.active_file = file_name st.success(f"âœ… {file_name} dosyasÄ± gÃ¼ncellendi!") st.rerun() else: st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][file_name] = file_content st.session_state.active_file = file_name st.success(f"âœ… {file_name} dosyasÄ± eklendi!") st.rerun() except Exception as e: st.error(f"âŒ Python dosyasÄ± okuma hatasÄ±: {str(e)}") # Toplu proje import st.subheader("ğŸ“¦ Toplu Ä°mport") uploaded_zip = st.file_uploader( "ZIP dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kle", type=['zip'], help="Birden fazla Python dosyasÄ± iÃ§eren ZIP dosyasÄ± yÃ¼kleyin" ) if uploaded_zip is not None: try: with zipfile.ZipFile(uploaded_zip, 'r') as zip_file: python_files = [f for f in zip_file.namelist() if f.endswith('.py')] if python_files: st.write(f"ğŸ“„ Bulunan Python dosyalarÄ±: {len(python_files)}") for py_file in python_files: st.write(f"â€¢ {py_file}") zip_project_name = st.text_input( "ZIP projesi adÄ±", value=uploaded_zip.name.replace('.zip', '') ) if st.button("ğŸ“¥ ZIP Projesini Ä°mport Et") and zip_project_name: project_key = zip_project_name.lower().replace(' ', '_').replace('-', '_') if project_key in st.session_state.projects: st.warning("âš ï¸ Bu isimde bir proje zaten var!") else: # Yeni proje oluÅŸtur new_project_files = {} for py_file in python_files: file_content = zip_file.read(py_file).decode('utf-8') file_name = os.path.basename(py_file) # Sadece dosya adÄ±nÄ± al new_project_files[file_name] = file_content st.session_state.projects[project_key] = { 'name': zip_project_name, 'files': new_project_files } st.session_state.active_project = project_key st.session_state.active_file = list(new_project_files.keys())[0] st.success(f"âœ… {zip_project_name} projesi ({len(python_files)} dosya) baÅŸarÄ±yla import edildi!") st.rerun() else: st.warning("âš ï¸ ZIP dosyasÄ±nda Python dosyasÄ± bulunamadÄ±!") except Exception as e: st.error(f"âŒ ZIP dosyasÄ± okuma hatasÄ±: {str(e)}") # Ana iÃ§erik alanÄ± current_project = st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project] current_file_content = current_project['files'][st.session_state.active_file] # Proje bilgileri col1, col2, col3 = st.columns([2, 1, 1]) with col1: st.markdown(f"### ğŸ“ {current_project['name']}") with col2: st.markdown(f"**ğŸ“„ Dosya:** `{st.session_state.active_file}`") with col3: if st.button("ğŸ”„ SayfayÄ± Yenile"): st.rerun() # Tab'lar tab1, tab2, tab3 = st.tabs(["âœï¸ Kod EditÃ¶rÃ¼", "ğŸ‘ï¸ Ã–nizleme", "ğŸ“Š Analiz"]) with tab1: st.subheader(f"ğŸ“ {st.session_state.active_file} - Kod EditÃ¶rÃ¼") # Kod editÃ¶rÃ¼ edited_code = st.text_area( "Kod", value=current_file_content, height=500, help="Python kodunuzu buraya yazÄ±n", label_visibility="collapsed" ) # Kod gÃ¼ncelleme if edited_code != current_file_content: if st.button("ğŸ’¾ DeÄŸiÅŸiklikleri Kaydet"): st.session_state.projects[st.session_state.active_project]['files'][st.session_state.active_file] = edited_code st.success("âœ… Kod baÅŸarÄ±yla kaydedildi!") st.rerun() # Kod kopyalama st.code(current_file_content, language='python') col1, col2 = st.columns(2) with col1: if st.button("ğŸ“‹ Kodu Kopyala"): st.code(current_file_content, language='python') st.info("ğŸ’¡ YukarÄ±daki kod bloÄŸundan kopyalayabilirsiniz") with col2: # Dosya indirme st.download_button( label="ğŸ“ DosyayÄ± Ä°ndir", data=current_file_content, file_name=st.session_state.active_file, mime="text/plain" ) with tab2: st.subheader("ğŸ‘ï¸ Kod Ã–nizlemesi") st.markdown("""

ğŸš€ Streamlit'te Ã‡alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rma TalimatlarÄ±:

  2. Yeni bir .py dosyasÄ± oluÅŸturup yapÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±n

""", unsafe_allow_html=True) # Kod syntax highlighting st.code(current_file_content, language='python') with tab3: st.subheader("ğŸ“Š Kod Analizi") # Kod istatistikleri lines = current_file_content.split('\n') col1, col2, col3, col4 = st.columns(4) with col1: st.metric("ğŸ“ Toplam SatÄ±r", len(lines)) with col2: non_empty_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip()]) st.metric("ğŸ“ Kod SatÄ±rlarÄ±", non_empty_lines) with col3: comment_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip().startswith('#')]) st.metric("ğŸ’¬ Yorum SatÄ±rlarÄ±", comment_lines) with col4: import_lines = len([line for line in lines if line.strip().startswith(('import ', 'from '))]) st.metric("ğŸ“¦ Import SatÄ±rlarÄ±", import_lines) # Import analizi imports = [line.strip() for line in lines if line.strip().startswith(('import ', 'from '))] if imports: st.subheader("ğŸ“¦ KullanÄ±lan KÃ¼tÃ¼phaneler") for imp in imports: st.code(imp, language='python') # Footer st.divider() st.markdown("""
